{"output":"     1	import * as React from "react"
     2	import { Slot } from "@radix-ui/react-slot"
     3	import { cva, type VariantProps } from "class-variance-authority"
     4	
     5	import { cn } from "@ui/shadcn/utils"
     6	
     7	const buttonVariants = cva(
     8	  "inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 whitespace-nowrap rounded-md text-sm font-medium transition-all disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 [&_svg]:pointer-events-none [&_svg:not([class*='size-'])]:size-4 shrink-0 [&_svg]:shrink-0 outline-none focus-visible:border-ring focus-visible:ring-ring/50 focus-visible:ring-[var(--line-width)] aria-invalid:ring-destructive/20 dark:aria-invalid:ring-destructive/40 aria-invalid:border-destructive",
     9	  {
    10	    variants: {
    11	      variant: {
    12	        default: "bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90",
    13	        destructive:
    14	          "bg-destructive text-white hover:bg-destructive/90 focus-visible:ring-destructive/20 dark:focus-visible:ring-destructive/40 dark:bg-destructive/60",
    15	        outline:
    16	          "border bg-background shadow-xs hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground dark:bg-input/30 dark:border-input dark:hover:bg-input/50",
    17	        secondary:
    18	          "bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80",
    19	        ghost:
    20	          "hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground dark:hover:bg-accent/50",
    21	        link: "text-primary underline-offset-4 hover:underline",
    22	      },
    23	      size: {
    24	        default: "h-9 px-4 py-2 has-[>svg]:px-3",
    25	        sm: "h-8 rounded-md gap-1.5 px-3 has-[>svg]:px-2.5",
    26	        lg: "h-10 rounded-md px-6 has-[>svg]:px-4",
    27	        icon: "size-9",
    28	        "icon-sm": "size-8",
    29	        "icon-lg": "size-10",
    30	      },
    31	    },
    32	    defaultVariants: {
    33	      variant: "default",
    34	      size: "default",
    35	    },
    36	  }
    37	)
    38	
    39	function Button({
    40	  className,
    41	  variant,
    42	  size,
    43	  asChild = false,
    44	  ...props
    45	}: React.ComponentProps<"button"> &
    46	  VariantProps<typeof buttonVariants> & {
    47	    asChild?: boolean
    48	  }) {
    49	  const Comp = asChild ? Slot : "button"
    50	
    51	  return (
    52	    <Comp
    53	      data-slot="button"
    54	      className={cn(buttonVariants({ variant, size, className }))}
    55	      {...props}
    56	    />
    57	  )
    58	}
    59	
    60	export { Button, buttonVariants }
","metadata":{"exit_code":0,"duration_seconds":0.0}}

payload.text:
**Preparing final summary message**

I'll explain the line-width change clearly, list relevant file references, note no tests were run, and suggest running lint and visually verifying the update in the browser—all arranged in concise bullet points with optional headers for clarity.

payload.message:
**Change**
- Updated the shared line-width token to `1.5px` for both light and dark themes so all `@ui/shadcn` components in this app render thinner borders and focus rings (`app/gapyear/app/globals.css:25`, `app/gapyear/app/globals.css:89`).

**Context**
- Components such as the button and tabs triggers consume `var(--line-width)` for their focus outlines, so the thinner value now applies automatically (`packages/ui/shadcn/components/ui/button.tsx:8`, `packages/ui/shadcn/components/ui/tabs.tsx:43`).

**Next Steps**
- 1) Run `pnpm dev` inside `app/gapyear` and confirm the new thickness looks right across the Hero, Feature tabs, and Testimonial sections.

content.text:
**Change**
- Updated the shared line-width token to `1.5px` for both light and dark themes so all `@ui/shadcn` components in this app render thinner borders and focus rings (`app/gapyear/app/globals.css:25`, `app/gapyear/app/globals.css:89`).

**Context**
- Components such as the button and tabs triggers consume `var(--line-width)` for their focus outlines, so the thinner value now applies automatically (`packages/ui/shadcn/components/ui/button.tsx:8`, `packages/ui/shadcn/components/ui/tabs.tsx:43`).

**Next Steps**
- 1) Run `pnpm dev` inside `app/gapyear` and confirm the new thickness looks right across the Hero, Feature tabs, and Testimonial sections.
